aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text: Welcome to VS Skate Shop! Since our founding, we have dedicated ourselves to providing the highest quality skateboards and accessories. Our mission is to promote skateboarding culture and support skateboarders of all levels. We believe in community, passion, and the joy of skateboarding. Our team carefully selects the best products on the market to ensure every customer has the best experience. Whether youâ€™re just starting or a seasoned pro, we have everything you need to pursue your skateboarding passion.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text: Your privacy is important to us. At VS Skate Shop, we are committed to protecting the personal information of our customers. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data. We collect information to improve our services and provide you with a better shopping experience. All data is handled with strict confidentiality, and we will never share your information with third parties without consent. For questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.

shippingReturnPolicy.title: Shipping & Return Policy
shippingReturnPolicy.text: We strive to process and ship all orders within 2-3 business days. Shipping fees vary depending on your location and order size. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may return unused items within 30 days of receipt for a full refund. To initiate a return, please contact our customer service. We are committed to ensuring customer satisfaction and will work with you to resolve any issues.

termsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsConditions.text: By using our website and services, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined here. VS Skate Shop reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. We encourage you to review this page regularly. All purchases are subject to availability and our approval. Our products are for personal use only and cannot be resold without permission. If you have any questions about these terms, please reach out to us for clarification.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: Review your cart and proceed to payment.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Thank you for your purchase! Your order is being processed and you will receive an email confirmation shortly.

cancel.title: Payment Failed
cancel.description: Something went wrong during the payment process. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

checkout.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while processing your order. If your payment was successful, please contact support to confirm your order. Please note below your order details.

404.title: Page Not Found
